title: Can we get old client back until this one is fixed?
body: Like, it's so buggy, and I heard changing it to legacy client causes a problem where you can't play.

replies.body: Are you still having issues with the legacy client, as you've mentioned below? I've been able to use it over the weekend without issues.
There's some bugs with it, but it updated and now it's working a bit better. I kind of miss the old one but I heard switching it over makes it crash whenever you try to log in after logging out.

https://gyazo.com/bbc4b8b59a2f8083b391ece8d4f987bb

This is at the bottom right of the client. Click it and done.
I just said that there's a bug when you do that where some people can't play.
